column4: where can i get a list of games available for ubuntu via apt-get ?
or just find some games to play

: I had much better luck with games using gentoo... which is to say they have a lot of free games and demos in their ports collection.  For Ubuntu, even with multiverse, I didn't see much in apt (no UT2004, for example).  You'll problably have to get the software out-of-distro.
